targets.expr: group by (name, job_type, system_count, start) (last_over_time(wsjob_annotation{name=~"$wsjob", start!=""}[$__range]))
group by (name, job_type, system_count, end) (last_over_time(wsjob_annotation{name=~"$wsjob", end!=""}[$__range]))

label_replace(sum by (job_name) (group by (job_name, node) (last_over_time(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob", node=~"$node", device=~"$node_port", pod_name=~"$pod", port=~"$switch_port", switch=~"$switch"}[$__range]))), "name", "$1", "job_name", "(.*)")

panels.description:
Definitions

  • System: a server that hosts the Cerebras wafer.
  • Node: a commodity server supporting the job (coordinator, activation, etc.).
  • NIC: network interface on a node. Multiple pods on the same node may share the same NIC.
  • Leaf switch: a network switch to which nodes and system are directly connected.
  • Spine switch: a switch connecting multiple leaf switches, enabling nodes/systems connected to different leaf switches to communicate with each other.

targets.expr: sum by (job_name,pod_name,node,device,device_ip,port,switch) (count_over_time(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob", node=~"$node", device=~"$node_port", pod_name=~"$pod", port=~"$switch_port", switch=~"$switch"}[$__range]))

group by (node, device) (present_over_time(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob", node=~"$node", device=~"$node_port", pod_name=~"$pod", port=~"$switch_port", switch=~"$switch"}[$__range])) * on (node, device) group_left increase(interface_watch_list:status_changes_total[$__range]) >= 2

panels.title: Links: Node - Leaf

panels.description: Spine switches may appear here, even if a job isn't using them. This shows all spine switches reachable from leaf switches connected to the job's nodes.

targets.expr: group by (node, device, ifName, switch_id) (interface_watch_list{node=~"$switch", switch_id=~"$spine_switch"})

group by (node, device) (interface_watch_list{node=~"$switch", switch_id=~"$spine_switch"}) * on(node, device) group by (node, device) (label_replace(label_replace(increase(linkmon_switch_carrier_changes[$__range]) >= 2, "device", "$1", "port", "(.*)"), "node", "$1", "switch", "(.*)"))

panels.title: Links: Leaf - Spine

panels.description: Connections between systems and leaf switches.
panels.title: Links: System - Leaf

targets.expr: (present_over_time(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"}[$__range]) * on (node, interface) group_left avg(increase(node_nic_stats_carrier_changes{node=~"$node", interface=~"$node_port"}[11m])) by (node, interface)) > 0

panels.description: Interfaces that aren't responding to pings (using CPingmesh).
panels.title: Unreachable Ports
Node Rx Stream Sequence Errors (Tx NAKs)
Node Tx Stream Sequence Errors (Rx NAKs)

targets.expr: job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (node, interface) group_left avg(node_nic_stats_temperature{node=~"$node", interface=~"$node_port"}) by (node, interface)
job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (node, interface) group_left avg(node_nic_stats_opt_temperature{node=~"$node", interface=~"$node_port"}) by (node, interface)
job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_rx_kbps{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}) by (switch, port)
job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_tx_kbps{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}) by (switch, port)
job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(irate(linkmon_switch_rx_pfc{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[$__rate_interval])) by (switch, port) > 0
job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(irate(linkmon_switch_tx_pfc{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[$__rate_interval])) by (switch, port) > 0
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(increase(linkmon_switch_crc_errors{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[11m])) by (switch, port)) > 0

(present_over_time(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"}[$__range]) * on (switch, port) group_left avg(increase(linkmon_switch_carrier_changes{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[$__rate_interval])) by (switch, port)) > 0

job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(irate(linkmon_switch_delta_fec_corrected_codewords{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[$__rate_interval])) by (switch, port) > 0

(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(increase(linkmon_switch_delta_fec_uncorrected_codewords{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[11m])) by (switch, port)) > 0
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(increase(linkmon_switch_out_discards{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[11m])) by (switch, port)) > 0
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(increase(linkmon_switch_in_discards{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[11m])) by (switch, port)) > 0
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(increase(linkmon_switch_ecn_marked_packets_tc5{switch=~"$switch", port=~"$switch_port"}[11m])) by (switch, port)) > 0
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_temperature{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_current_lane1{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_current_lane2{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_current_lane3{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_current_lane4{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_rx_power_lane1{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_rx_power_lane2{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_rx_power_lane3{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_rx_power_lane4{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_power_lane1{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_power_lane2{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_power_lane3{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))
(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob"} * on (switch, port) group_left avg(linkmon_switch_opt_tx_power_lane4{switch="$switch", port="$switch_port"}) by (switch, port))

panels.description:
The graph line color indicates the direction:
  • Light blue: spine -> leaf
  • Dark blue : leaf -> spine
panels.title: Switch Rx kbps

list.description: Filter pod results based on a regex
list.label: Pod Regex
list.name: pod_regex

list.description: Filter node results based on a regex
list.label: Node Regex
list.name: node_regex

list.description: Filter switch results based on a regex
list.label: Leaf Switch Regex
list.name: switch_regex

list.definition: query_result(group by (switch) (rate(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob", interface=~"$node_port", node=~"$node"}[$__range])) * on (switch) group_right label_replace((avg by (switch_id, node) (interface_watch_list)), "switch", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))
list.label: Spine Switch
list.name: spine_switch

query.query: query_result(group by (switch) (rate(job:leaf_switch_port_info{job_name=~"$wsjob", interface=~"$node_port", node=~"$node"}[$__range])) * on (switch) group_right label_replace((avg by (switch_id, node) (interface_watch_list)), "switch", "$1", "node", "(.*)"))
